Key Match Events: Gerrit Cole pitched a gem, holding the Kansas City Royals to a single run over seven innings
Juan Soto, Gleyber Torres and Giancarlo Stanton drove in runs for the Yankees
Michael Wacha failed to get through five innings for Kansas City, allowing two runs, six hits and a walk
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Matt Quatraro expressed disappointment about the team's loss and the long losing streak at home
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees won 50 games away from home in the regular season, their most in 21 years
Kansas City did not win a home game after Sept. 8, losing nine in a row including the playoffs
Others: The series was a rematch of the 2015 World Series, which the Royals won
The Yankees will play Cleveland or Detroit of the ALCS starting Monday night at Yankee Stadium
